ttbasetheme.banner.title: Allow Banner module for TT Base Theme Extension
ttbasetheme.banner.description: The Tavano Team Banner module lets you add an image and text that displays over the image using Site Management Tools.  You can: choose the text color and opt to have text-shadow based on your Theme Settings, select the position of your content, add a call-to-action button and select the button style.
